DOC.detailed_description: Acute otitis externa ( AOE ) define diffuse inflammation external ear canal , may also involve pinna and/or tympanic membrane . AOE one common infection encountered otolaryngologist , pediatrician family physician . Diagnosis AOE require rapid onset ( generally within 48 hour ) symptoms sign ear canal inflammation include : A ) otalgia ( often severe ) , itch fullness , sometimes accompany reduced hearing jaw pain ; B ) tenderness tragus and/or pinna ; C ) diffuse ear canal edema without erythema , sometimes accompanied ear discharge ( otorrhea ) .
